spatial_accuracy.notes: Door placements are largely correct but orientation of the master bedroom door is reversed. Window placements are approximated but not perfectly aligned with the technical drawing.

structural_fidelity.notes: The living room partition wall is significantly shortened compared to the source. The hallway/niche area near the bathroom has incorrect wall terminations.

furniture_mapping.notes: Most furniture matches the layout well, though the L-shaped sofa and kitchen counter depth show minor scale inconsistencies.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High quality rendering with clean geometry and consistent lighting. Isometric perspective is accurate.

detected_errors.description: Master bedroom door swings outward/incorrectly compared to the inward swing in the plan.
Living room internal partition wall is too short, failing to create the defined hall path seen in the 2D plan.
The sink in the master bedroom area is shifted away from the corner compared to the plan.
Corner window artifacting in the bottom left living area where the wall meets the entry.
